input.sentences: the hotel just got a new sign
and the local place did too .
there was a cool car outside
that parked at the hotel later .
output.sentences: There was a sign at a local hotel for a car show
The local parks and recreation department holds a lot of events
This event was for locals to show off their cool cars
A local steak resturaunt and a coffee shop said they would donate food and coffee for the event
The cars were parked in the hotel parking lot
